DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project reduce health disparity obesity risk among 8-10 year old African American girl use culturally sensitive developmentally appropriate internet-based program face-to-face interaction . This study conduct outcome evaluation test short long term effect obesity risk .
DOC.brief_title: Food , Fun , & Fitness Internet Program Girls : Outcome Evaluation
DOC.detailed_description: This research conduct outcome evaluation promise web base obesity prevention program 8-10 year old African American girl . A pilot study 80 girl establish feasibility : recruitment goal meet ; attrition rate < 10 % ; logon rate online program 74.5 % ; statistically significant increase fruit vegetable consumption time spend physically active observe . The outcome evaluation recruit 400 child-parent pair examine short long term effect program obesity risk . It also conduct mediation analysis examine pathway effect . At end study , web base program host CNRC web site . Although use internet method change health behavior new , use internet program alone , face face interaction , novel . This one first program attempt , particularly at-risk population .
DOC.criteria: 810 year old healthy African American parent willing participate data collection internet access personal email address mental , physical , medical condition limit fruitvegetable consumption , physical activity , ability fully participate program and/or complete baseline post assessment data collection take medication influence dietary behavior , appetite , and/or physical activity
